ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))
If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
If
(
    Coalesce(gvCRUDOrder.OrderStatusID, fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW) = fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW || gvCRUDOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit, 
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(gvCRUDOrder.OrderStatusID, fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW) = fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW || 
    Coalesce(gvCRUDOrder.OrderStatusID, fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW) = fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusINV|| 
    gvCRUDOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(gvCRUDOrder.OrderStatusID, fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW) = fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW ||
    Coalesce(gvCRUDOrder.OrderStatusID, fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW) = fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusINV ||
    Coalesce(gvCRUDOrder.OrderStatusID, fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusNEW) = fMagicNo.gvOrderStatusSHP|| 
    gvCRUDOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

Filter(
    [
        "Cash",
        "Check",
        "Credit Card"
    ],
    LookUp(
        fOrders,
        OrderID = gvCRUDOrder.OrderID,
        PaymentMethod
    )
)

Filter(
    fCompanies,
    CompanyID = LookUp(
        fOrders,
        OrderID = Coalesce(gvCRUDOrder.OrderID,0),
        CustomerID
    )
)

Filter (
    fSubmitters,
    EmployeeID = Coalesce(
        LookUp (
            fOrders,
            OrderID = gvCRUDOrder.OrderID,
            EmployeeID
        ),
        10
    )
)

Text(
    Sum(
        glryEditOrderLineItemsAdd.AllItems,
        UnitPrice * (1 - Discount) * Quantity
    ) * LookUp(
        fOrders,
        OrderID = gvCRUDOrder.OrderID,
        TaxRate
    ) * LookUp(
        fCompanies,
        CompanyID = cboCustomerOrdersAdd.Selected.CompanyID,
        StandardTaxStatusID
    ),
    "$#,##0.00"
)

Filter(
    fCompanies,
    CompanyID = LookUp(
        fOrders,
        OrderID = gvCRUDOrder.OrderID,
        ShipperID
    )
)

Set(
    gvOrderShipFields,
    If(
        Coalesce(
            Self.Selected.CompanyID,
            0
        ) <> 0,
        Color.White,
        fAppColors.gvWarningFill
    )
)

Text(
    Sum(
        glryEditOrderLineItemsAdd.AllItems,
        UnitPrice * (1 - Discount) * Quantity
    ),
    "$#,##0.00"
)

Filter(
    Sort(
        fOrderDetails,
        OrderDetailID,
        SortOrder.Ascending
    ),
    OrderID = gvCRUDOrder.OrderID
)

LookUp(
    fProductCategories,
    ProductCategoryID = LookUp(
        fProducts,
        ProductID = ThisItem.ProductID,
        ProductCategoryID
    )
)

Filter(
    Sort(
        fProducts,
        ProductName,
        SortOrder.Ascending
    ),
    ProductCategoryID = cboProductCategoryOrderLineItemsAdd.Selected.ProductCategoryID
)

LookUp(
    Filter(
        fStatuses,
        TableName = "OrderDetails"
    ),
    StatusID = ThisItem.OrderDetailStatusID
)

If(IsBlank(gvCRUDOrder),Notify("Create an order before Adding Products",NotificationType.Error,
    fMagicNo.gvNotifyTimeout))

Sort(
    Filter(
        fProducts,
        ProductCategoryID = cboProductCategoryAddOrderLineItemsAdd.Selected.ProductCategoryID,
        Discontinued = false
    ),
    ProductName
)
